title: The Devil's Due
description: Gretchen Tanner doesn’t know what or who she wants. Unfortunately for her, all three men in her life don’t share her problem. They all want her, and they all have their own reasons. To further their agendas the Cade Brothers take Gretchen to Texas where she meets the family, figures out who’s really responsible for her sister’s murder, and decides who she really loves. The only problem is she might not survive long enough to tell him. The Devil’s wants his due, and he’ll take it by any means necessary.
author: Julie Mangan
